attributes.review: Once it downloaded, it took me to a bunch of ads telling me to vape, I’m 17!!! And then when i wanted to delete it, it showed me trumps lil cheeto puff (you know what i mean 🍤🤢) and said “are u sure baby gorl.” i’m appalled. i do not recommend this app. so unprofessional.
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: this app is terribleee!! it cursed me and my family and almost got us all killed🤕 i believe tnay donald the orange man trump is putting a curse on me😡😡 this app is terrible 10/10 do NOT recommend😤 it also made my house smell like eggs :)
attributes.title: oh to see without my eyes🙈

attributes.review: If I could give this app 0 stars, I would. Really bad vibes. This app contained lots of inappropriate content that I do not want to say. My grandma was on it and after learning this, she deleted it. Thank goodness she did🙏. If you like Trump DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.title: Inappropriate Content

attributes.review: I downloaded the app but it takes hours for the app to actually load. The quality of the app is poor and it wasn’t what I was expecting.
attributes.title: Slow

attributes.review: I was looking at the news and then my phone randomly transformed into a robot that has a orange head it went up to my cat said I am Chinese I am a terrible person because of the race I am and ate my cat I am mentally and physically scarred.
attributes.title: It ate my cat

attributes.review: By far the worst app on here it takes forever to load it takes me having to power off my phone to even get it to work. Never works on WiFi’s or data 🤬
attributes.title: Haha

attributes.review: Terrible takes too long to download many bugs would not recommend and is not ready to be on the app store.

i downloaded this app and all the sudden rats came out of nowhere and started attacking me. the app then teleported me to where trump was and he started to punch me and picked me up by my legs and started throwing me against the wall multiple times. then the app took me to a aidan gallanger concert and he stared singing she and it hurt my ears so bad, that i went def in my right ear. i don’t recommend this app at all and on top of that it took 20 years to download.
attributes.title: horrific

attributes.review: The whole entire time I tried to use the app all of my family members kept fainting. I think the trump administration has been putting MICROCHIPS in people who interact with this app!!! Please spread the word and help this be known!!!!!!
